entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14 with temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 14 with temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
